identity.mission: Create a digital sanctuary that feels like a midnight conversation with the universe. Avoid kitschy 'crystal shop' vibes; aim for 'luxury cosmic consultancy'.
principles: Fusion: Ancient Astrology x Modern SaaS (Swiss Style).
Emotion: Every interaction should feel like a revelation.
Depth: Use layers, glass, and shadows to create a sense of the unknown.

headings.usage: Use for all H1-H3. It conveys ancient wisdom and elegance.

body.usage: Use for all body text, UI elements, and data.

mono.usage: Use for tiny labels, dates, or 'technical' astrology data (degrees, coordinates).

borders.tracing_beam: Use a moving gradient border for 'Featured Service' cards.

texture.noise: Overlay a 5% opacity noise texture on the main background to kill digital flatness.

Button.default: bg-white text-black hover:bg-slate-200 rounded-full px-8 py-6 font-medium tracking-wide transition-transform hover:scale-105
Button.outline: border border-white/20 text-white hover:bg-white/10 rounded-full px-8 py-6

Input.style: bg-white/5 border-white/10 focus:border-purple-500/50 text-white placeholder:text-white/30 rounded-lg h-12

elements: Sub: 'Ancient wisdom meets modern guidance. Trusted by 248+ souls.'
CTA: 'Book a Reading' (Primary) + 'Chat with Spirit AI' (Secondary)
Background: 'Vibrant purple nebula' image with overlay.

admin_dashboard.style: Professional Dark Mode (muted purples, high contrast text)

images.usage: Overlay for 'Psychic Reading' card hover state

motion.page_load: Fade in with slight upward drift (staggered)

accessibility.contrast: Ensure all text is WCAG AA compliant. Use lighter grays (#CBD5E1) on dark backgrounds, never dark gray.
accessibility.focus: Visible purple ring offset by 2px on all interactive elements.

tech_stack.frontend: React (Create React App) + Tailwind CSS + Framer Motion (recommended for effects)

instructions_to_main_agent.1: Install 'lucide-react' for icons if not present.
instructions_to_main_agent.2: Configure 'tailwind.config.js' to add the custom colors and font families (Cormorant Garamond, Manrope).
instructions_to_main_agent.3: Create a 'Layout' component that wraps pages with the Navbar and Footer.
instructions_to_main_agent.4: Implement the 'Tetris Grid' for the Services section using CSS Grid.
instructions_to_main_agent.5: Build the 'BookingForm' using Shadcn concepts (customized) - do not use raw HTML inputs.
instructions_to_main_agent.6: Ensure the 'Admin Dashboard' is distinct - simpler, higher density, but still dark mode.

UNIVERSAL_GUIDELINES_FOR_MAIN_AGENT: Dark colors look good when used independently without gradients. DO NOT use dark colors as gradients.
Don't make generic centered layouts, simplistic gradients, and uniform styling.
Create depth through layered design elements with z-index hierarchy.
Use glass-morphism effects with backdrop filters (12-24px blur).
You MUST NOT apply universal transition. Eg: 'transition: all'. This results in breaking transforms.
You MUST NOT center align the app container, ie do not add '.App { text-align: center; }' in the css file.
Always use modern button styles like pill-shaped, or sharp button with interaction animations.

Every interaction needs micro-animations - hover states, transitions.
Use 2-3x more spacing than feels comfortable.
